<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Macro compressed bit reversal table for 256 bits.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">/// http://graphics.stanford.edu/~seander/bithacks.html#BitReverseTable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adfda5f0036e72030542a8eb8a1ff38a1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adfda5f0036e72030542a8eb8a1ff38a1">BitReverseTable256</a>&#91;256&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define R2(n) n, n + 2 &#42; 64, n + 1 &#42; 64, n + 3 &#42; 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define R4(n) R2(n), R2(n + 2 &#42; 16), R2(n + 1 &#42; 16), R2(n + 3 &#42; 16)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define R6(n) R4(n), R4(n + 2 &#42; 4), R4(n + 1 &#42; 4), R4(n + 3 &#42; 4)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(0), <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(2), <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(1), <a href="#ace331bebb5bd2780b8dfb7e6e97db7dd">R6</a>(3)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#undef R2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#undef R4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#undef R6</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Reverse the bits in \\p Val.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae4ac99da28c2d9f17b8e8864697148f1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae4ac99da28c2d9f17b8e8864697148f1">reverseBits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> Val) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if &#95;&#95;has&#95;builtin(&#95;&#95;builtin&#95;bitreverse8)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::is&#95;same&#95;v&lt;T, uint8&#95;t&gt;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#95;&#95;builtin&#95;bitreverse8(Val);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#95;&#95;builtin&#95;bitreverse64(Val);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> in&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Val)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> out&#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Val)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memcpy(in, &amp;Val, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Val));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Val); ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    out&#91;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Val) - i) - 1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adfda5f0036e72030542a8eb8a1ff38a1">BitReverseTable256</a>&#91;in&#91;i&#93;&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::memcpy(&amp;Val, out, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Val));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Val;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Gets the maximum value for a N-bit unsigned integer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80bd4ec8a9b2f8e7d9d75ab708a55c2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80bd4ec8a9b2f8e7d9d75ab708a55c2">maxUIntN</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;= 64 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;integer width out of range&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; 64 is undefined behavior, so we can&#39;t do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; N) - 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// without checking first that N != 64  But this works and doesn&#39;t have a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branch for N != 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Unfortunately, shifting a uint64&#95;t right by 64 bit is undefined</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// behavior, so the condition on N == 0 is necessary. Fortunately, most</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimizers do not emit branches for this check.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; (64 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Gets the minimum value for a N-bit signed integer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Gets the maximum value for a N-bit signed integer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08b6d5c69d7933ac65aae84e1b50fa62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08b6d5c69d7933ac65aae84e1b50fa62">maxIntN</a>(int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> &lt;= 64 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;integer width out of range&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This relies on two&#39;s complement wraparound when N == 64, so we convert to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// int64&#95;t only at the very end to avoid UB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UINT64&#95;C(1) &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> - 1)) - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compile time Log2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Valid only for positive powers of two.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a157580cd43622bf53270856bf51da098"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> kValue&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a157580cd43622bf53270856bf51da098">CTLog2</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(kValue &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a434f6a0d80fb13e4326e848a6391f057">llvm::isPowerOf2&#95;64</a>(kValue),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Value is not a valid power of 2&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1 + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a157580cd43622bf53270856bf51da098">CTLog2</a>&lt;kValue / 2&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the floor log base 2 of the specified value, -1 if the value is zero.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (32 bit edition.)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Ex. Log2&#95;32(32) == 5, Log2&#95;32(1) == 0, Log2&#95;32(0) == -1, Log2&#95;32(6) == 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a646986783f35e0fef8988f0f28d2589f">Log2&#95;32</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 31 - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the floor log base 2 of the specified value, -1 if the value is zero.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns the integer ceil(Numerator / Denominator). Unsigned version.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T = common&#95;u</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&lt;U, V&gt;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(U Numerator, V Denominator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Denominator &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Division by zero&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> Bias = (Numerator != 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Numerator - Bias) / Denominator + Bias;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Fallback when arguments aren&#39;t integral.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64d0d2b3bdaf218872f93a90dfb1b05"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(uint64&#95;t Numerator, uint64&#95;t Denominator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Denominator &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Division by zero&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Bias = (Numerator != 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Numerator - Bias) / Denominator + Bias;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether divideCeilSigned or divideFloorSigned would overflow. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// happens only when Numerator = INT&#95;MIN and Denominator = -1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a09a698bbeb0d305b6471cfa2721f8b1f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a09a698bbeb0d305b6471cfa2721f8b1f">divideSignedWouldOverflow</a>(U Numerator, V Denominator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Numerator == std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;U&gt;::min() &amp;&amp; Denominator == -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns the integer ceil(Numerator / Denominator). Signed version.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Overflow is explicitly forbidden with an assert.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T = common&#95;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&lt;U, V&gt;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8eddd40a02fc7c1a3517207c9cebcbc1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8eddd40a02fc7c1a3517207c9cebcbc1">divideCeilSigned</a>(U Numerator, V Denominator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Denominator &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Division by zero&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a09a698bbeb0d305b6471cfa2721f8b1f">divideSignedWouldOverflow</a>(Numerator, Denominator) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Divide would overflow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Numerator)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// C&#39;s integer division rounds towards 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> Bias = Denominator &gt;= 0 ? 1 : -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SameSign = (Numerator &gt;= 0) == (Denominator &gt;= 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SameSign ? (Numerator - Bias) / Denominator + 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">                  : Numerator / Denominator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns the integer floor(Numerator / Denominator). Signed version.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Overflow is explicitly forbidden with an assert.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If non-zero \\p Skew is specified, the return value will be a minimal integer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that is greater than or equal to \\p Size and equal to \\p A &#42; N + \\p Skew for</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Skew mod \\p A&#39;. \\p Align must be non-zero.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Examples:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="comment">///   alignTo(5, 8, 7) = 7</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="comment">/// May overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> V, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> W,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Add two unsigned integers, X and Y, of type T.  Clamp the result to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="comment">/// maximum representable value of T on overflow.  ResultOverflowed indicates if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the result is larger than the maximum representable value of type T.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;std::is&#95;unsigned&#95;v&lt;T&gt;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae6b6948bfc113c3aa2f2dc474496fd6e"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae6b6948bfc113c3aa2f2dc474496fd6e">SaturatingAdd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ResultOverflowed = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Dummy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Overflowed = ResultOverflowed ? &#42;ResultOverflowed : Dummy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hacker&#39;s Delight, p. 29</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> Z = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">  Overflowed = (Z &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> || Z &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hacker&#39;s Delight, p. 30 has a different algorithm, but we don&#39;t use that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because it fails for uint16&#95;t (where multiplication can have undefined</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// behavior due to promotion to int), and requires a division in addition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the multiplication.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">  Overflowed = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Log2(Z) would be either Log2Z or Log2Z + 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Special case: if X or Y is 0, Log2&#95;64 gives -1, and Log2Z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will necessarily be less than Log2Max as desired.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Log2Z = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">Log2&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">Log2&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Log2Z &lt; Log2Max) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad67c6622d517b525fc5d420330d8b3f2"><Highlight kind="normal">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;std::is&#95;signed&#95;v&lt;T&gt;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad67c6622d517b525fc5d420330d8b3f2">AddOverflow</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;Result) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
